items.sentence: Some kids broke into Tom\'s house and ransacked it.
Some of them are healthy, but some of them aren\'t.
Some people seldom speak unless they\'re spoken to.
Some people think Tom\'s native language is French.
I had no idea Tom didn\'t know how to speak French.
I had no idea you didn\'t know how to speak French.
I plan to stay at home by myself and watch some TV.
I really appreciated your help yesterday afternoon.
I really wish I knew when Tom was going to be here.
I saw Tom wiping his fingerprints off the doorknob.
